article.title: DRS to Repair Combat Talon II Radar
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: DRS C3 & Aviation Company, Gaithersburg, Maryland, is being awarded a $26,028,869 firm-fixed-price contract for repair service applicable to the Combat Talon II Depot Repair Program for the APQ-170 radar.Â The 638 Supply Chain Management Group, Aircraft/Special Operations Forces/Armament Branch, C-5/SOF Rotary Wing Section/PKAA, Robins Air Force Base, Georgia, is the contracting activity.
